name: Monster Maze VR
description: Monster Maze VR is a Halloween theme game with monsters that you can shoot. You will be teleported in spooky scenes, where you need to find your way out of the mazes. A HTC Vive is required to play this game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews.review_text: Reccomended. It is immersive and it is scary. Very good armswing locomotion. I liked the game overall.
